live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 10:33 PT.
63589.summary: Some customers in the West Point Grey area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63589.title: July 6 - Vancouver (West Point Grey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63576.summary: Some customers in Manitouwadge are experiencing an interruption to their Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63576.title: July 6 - Manitouwadge | Television Services - Outage (Resolved)
